Natethegreat101,"2011-05-24T18:22:07.763Z","Excellent. A Bit steep on the price though","

For the Cars fanatic and maybe even people who are into just collecting new and/or
column2: unique parts, this set is definitely one you would want.
major characters of the Cars franchise:&nbsp
column3: Guido, Luigi, Lightning McQueen, Mater, and Francesco.

column1: • As in all Car sets, the decals on each car are printed, not stickers.

,TRUE,5,4,4,5,2 POWERCARTOON_","2011-11-23T07:43:03.47Z","Fantastic set , not so keen on the price.","

This is a nice addition to the cars theme , especially the fact the cars are fantastic , but i'll get to that later , i will highlight the pros and cons quickly.
*Printed decals on the cars (No stickers on any of them)
*A lot of stickers for the flags
Most of the cons shouldn't worry you too much though because there is still so much to do , including great pit stations
column3: plenty of cars and some nice tall buildings.

column1: I personally found fun in building this set and using it afterwards was awesome
column2: and i think you will find that&nbsp

column1: If you have read other reviews before this , you should know that the cars are brilliant despite the fact there not minifigures , they have cool decals and pieces (Lightning McQueen is my
Overall , if you can get this cheap then get it , toys r us in Uk have them half price and ebay sellers should sell them nearly just as cheap.

If you would like a more detailed review go to this guys youtube video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M4efcReDkp4
